member.name: T:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadraticMeshSimplification
member.summary: The fast quadratic mesh simplification algorithm.

member.name: P:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadraticMeshSimplification.Agressiveness
member.summary: Gets or sets the agressiveness of this algorithm. Higher number equals higher quality, but more expensive to run.

member.name: M:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadraticMeshSimplification.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new fast quadratic mesh simplification algorithm.

member.summary: Check if a triangle flips when this edge is removed

member.summary: Update triangle connections and edge error after a edge is collapsed.

member.summary: Remove vertices and mark deleted triangles

member.name: M:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadraticMeshSimplification.UpdateMesh(System.Int32)
member.summary: Compact triangles, compute edge error and build reference list.

member.name: M:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadraticMeshSimplification.CompactMesh
member.summary: Finally compact mesh before exiting.

member.summary: Initializes the algorithm with the original mesh.

member.summary: Decimates the mesh.

member.summary: Decimates the mesh without losing any quality.

member.name: M:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadraticMeshSimplification.ToMesh
member.summary: Returns the resulting mesh.
